instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332-a  no power , no green light .dead
threads.message:
hi ,

            this board has got


PPBUS_G3H    =  12.58v
MM
PP3V42_G3H = present 

PP5V_S5  = present


PM_SLP_S5_L = missing

SMC_S4_WAKESRC_EN = missing

 there is no green light  and there is no liquid damage  found on the board .

kindly advise

threads.title: 820-3332-a  no power , no green light .dead
threads.message: SMC seems to be running looking at PPBUS. First thing to try is a known good Magsafe board.
